NEW | FBI says noose in NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace’s garage was months old, no crime was committed

NASCAR's only full-time black driver found the noose in his garage. He'd led the push to ban the Confederate flag from NASCAR races, was targeted with hate
https://t.co/sU8tmKAzBM

text:

They're prepping for hundreds of thousands of straphangers to return to the system.

text:
Howard Mittman was forced out as CEO of Bleacher Report after employees passionately objected to the lack of diversity at the company’s executive level, sources confirmed to the Daily News.

text:
Police in Richmond, Va., rushed to save a Confederate statue.

They deployed chemical weapons and arrested six protesters who were part of a group trying to topple the monument.
